Prebon followed Attilla at a safe distance. He wanted to remain out of the =
other bots reach in case this was some sort of trick. He serveyed each twis=
t and turn downloading it to memory so he wouldn't get lost.
  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
  Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:49 PM
  Subject: RE: It's Showtime


  "O=
k Preborn" said Attilla "Let's go to see Shivah, i can bet that I know wher=
e's he right now"

  Attilla walked and he invited Preborn to follow him


=

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 3:38 AM
    Subject: Re: It's=
 Showtime


    Prebons face nearly turned to shock. this bot seemed like i=
t was completely oblivious to the name Prebon. His very name was spoken wit=
h honor for being the Trainer of some of the most successfull units in the =
Predacon army. "My name is Prebon, remember it with respect and dignity." t=
his bot obviously needed to be taught some order. Prebon began to wonder if=
 that is why he had been selected to transfer to this out of the way rock i=
n the universe.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: airly2000@y=
ahoo.com 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, May 28, 200=
1 10:23 PM
      Subject: RE: It's Showtime


      Attilla:

      "Don't =
press your luck, dwarf" said inside his mind the male and told to Preborn w=
ith the same tone "Follow me... with whom I have the honor?"
        ----- =
Original Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 3:15 AM
        Subject: Re:=
 It's Showtime


        Prebon looked over Attilla, the oposite bot was sl=
ightly taller and more armored than himself, The former Trainer leader alwa=
ys tried to size up a possible opponent before a fight. "Very well" he said=
 crossing his arms tightly in a peturbed fashion, "Then I will ask Shivah a=
bout how I AM to be treated." His arms went to his sides and he turned towa=
rds the door. "If you would be so considerate as to introduce us I would be=
 greatfull" He continued in mock courtesy making a request sound like an or=
der.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: airly2000@yaho=
o.com 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, May 28=
, 2001 9:13 AM
          Subject: RE: It's Showtime


          Attilla:

 =
         "Nope, it isn't the way " answered  Attilla "What do you think if =
Shivah solve this trouble... He can explain you what happened Ok?"
        =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
           =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:46 A=
M
            Subject: Re: It's Showtime


            Prebon stepped out, =
his memories were either gone or distorted but his leadership programs were=
 still intact. He remembered how roughly he was treated and how he was slam=
med into the CR chamber. To top it off he was always cranky when he woke up=
. "What is the meaning of this travesty?" he yelled. He saw Predacon emblem=
 on Attilla so he knew thought he wasn't a POW. "Is this any way to treat o=
ne of the Predacons best training units?" his record of service would have =
spoke for itself if he hadn't erased it when he left the Predacons to start=
 his own unit.
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              Fr=
om: airly2000@... 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        =
      Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 10:01 PM
              Subject: RE: It's S=
howtime


              Attilla:

              "Memories erased, reprogram=
ation ended"thought Attilla "This guy is ready to start duties."

         =
     Attilla typed some buttons and watied to Cr's door 0pen, "Hey, Hello"
=

              The bot was ready to fight just in case.
